name: Google Play Books Customizable Theme
description:
A Google Play Books theme that is customizable. You can change the background and text color to whatever you like.

Default Dark: Text #A3A3A3   BG #151515
For Sophia: Text #714813   BG #fdf9cc
additional_info:
APR20222: I will no longer be updating this since Google Play Books has a dark theme now.
NOV2022: Updated to fix some issues with menus.
